title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: The W.N.B.A. Gets More Attention Now. That’s Not Always a Good Thing.
items.description: The league’s popularity has given rise to online sexism and racism — and misinformation that traffics in both.

items.title: AstraZeneca makes deal with White House to lower drug prices
items.description: The U.K.-based drugmaker became the second to strike a deal with the Trump administration as part of the president's push to rein in U.S. drug prices.

items.title: The Trump Split Screen: A Peacemaker Abroad, a Retribution Campaign at Home

items.title: Clark Olofsson, 78, Dies; Bank Robber Helped Inspire ‘Stockholm Syndrome’
items.description: In a 1973 heist, he and another man held hostages who surprisingly came to defend them, drawing attention to a puzzling psychological phenomenon.

items.title: Strikes on Venezuelan Boats Prompt Rare U.N. Meeting on the United States
items.description: The U.N. Security Council met Friday to discuss the Trump administration’s deadly attacks on what it asserts were drug smugglers in the Caribbean.

items.title: The A.I. Prompt That Could End the World
items.description: A destructive A.I., like a nuclear bomb, is now a concrete possibility; the question is whether anyone will be reckless enough to build one.
